title: Soups On
question_text: A company producing cans of soup was interested in checking the weight of its chicken soup cans. While marked at $16$ ounces, the company was concerned whether it was meeting this amount. A random sample of $36$ cans was taken and the sample mean was found to be $16.2$ ounces with a standard deviation of $0.8$ ounces. Find the value of the $t$ statistic as well as its degrees of freedom.
